ComicInfo.Title: The Plot of Prince Diablo; A Trip into the Unknown; Duel with Saladin; The House of Four Elms; The Space Leeches of Planet Bloodu; The Emerald Men of Asperus; The Octopeople of Ectroia
ComicInfo.Summary:
Space Smith and Dianna escape imprisonment at the the hands of the leech-like inhabitants of the planet Bloodu.
Stardust prevents the Emerald Men of Asperus from using gas bombs to enslave the people of Earth.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-16 18:10:15. [Issue ID 893]
